app.processing-payment-redirection: Vous allez être redirigé vers votre banque pour finaliser le payment
cart.title: Mon panier
cart.item-booking-time-info: Les articles dans le panier ne sont pas réservés.
cart.shipping-time-info-label: Livraisons effectuées dans les 5 à 10 jours suivant la commande.
checkout.email-sent-info: An email with the code has been sent to
checkout.pending-payment-processing-sub-: We’re just waiting for the confirmation from your bank… This might take a moment
checkout.success-payment-processing-sub-: Woot! You successfully made a payment with Stripe.

We just sent your receipt to your email address, and your items
              will be on their way shortly.
checkout.failed-payment-processing-sub-t:
It looks like your order could not be paid at this time. Please
              try again or select a different payment option.
